entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Illegal instruction in libhostfxr.so #109131
  • Publishing Blazor with AOT:true hangs then fails on generic partial-scoped class references #109128
  • [HttpStress] `H3_REQUEST_REJECTED` in Get / Get Slow #109121
    10.0.0
  • Version conflicts while building runtime repo in source-build config #109120
  • int.TryParse has become ambigous when used with dynamic #109117
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Migrate to Compose plugin in Linux pipelines #109113
    Future
  • Native SIGSEGV crashes in mono_method_to_ir #109111
  • CMake doesn't find brotli modules when building with CLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_BROTLI #109105
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 10/18/2024 8:32:15 PM - Churn from Block Layout Changes #109122
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 10/15/2024 10:23:56 PM - Cloning Change #109123
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 10/14/2024 10:37:27 PM #109124
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 5 Regressions on 10/17/2024 5:07:04 PM #109125
  • Running console application that creates and joins with short-lived threads leaks handles when debugger is attached #109103
  • Event Tracing for TransactionScope does not work. #109101
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory for InvalidEnumArgumentException #109099
  • [API Proposal]: Extend the functionality of `TimeSpan` custom format strings #109095
    Future

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'fgFirstColdBlock == nullptr' #109100
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTestWithMcj/BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #108698
  • [release/9.0] HostActivation installer tests are expecting 9.0.0 but getting 9.0.0-ci in PRs #108994
    9.0.0
  • DateTime.Now returns incorrect time on windows computer when time zone has changed #31043
    Future
  • Can't use System::IntPtr #109115
  • [NET9] [REGRESSION] Gmail API fail with TieredCompilation disabled #108969
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 10/14/2024 10:37:27 PM #109126
  • `IPGlobalProperties.DomainName` returns `"(none)"` on Linux #104882
    Future
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] QuicException: Stream aborted by peer (258) in `(POST Duplex | PUT) Slow` #100534
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0 MAUI App: TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc(datetime) returns inconsitent results on different paltforms #109106
  • CMake Error: 'arm64' is an unsupported architecture #108987
  • publishing Blazor with AOT is now broken in 8.0.10 AspNetCore #109089
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Not possbile to run locally with docker #108551
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: public ctor for CookieException with string parameter #95965
    10.0.0
  • [.NET 9] DllImport with Custom Marshaler Passes non-null address when `null` value for field is specified. #109033

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Permit unencrypted key exports from CNG #109134
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement `ISOSDacInterface::GetModule` and `IXCLRDataModule::GetFileName` #109133
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [ActivityInfo] Avoid writing extra byte by updating length #109132
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add X509Certificate2Collection.FindByThumbprint #109130
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Introduce transient code mechanism for SPCL. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use properties for some [GeneratedRegex]s #109118
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    area-System.Net
  • FileShare change to ReadWrite #109104
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Sync with PR#107282: Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks. #109102
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [GC] Add const int gc_heap::n_heaps = 1 and remove #ifdefs #109094
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Permit unencrypted key exports from CNG #109119
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Run `Compiler::fgDetermineFirstColdBlock` at most once #109127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix return address hijacking with CET #109074
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Lazily read global string/object method table pointers #109093
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Initialize managed and native values in the ICustomMarshaler marshaler to null when the other is null. #109096
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IPGlobalProperties.DomainName to return string.Empty when domain name is not set #107241
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [cmake] add osx support in CMakePresets.json #109061
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Put brotli on the FetchContent plan" #109108
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • [API Implementation]: Expose CookieException constructors #109026
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Track visited blocks in LSRA with post-order number-based `BitVec` #108932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change return type for MemberData tests to array #109090
    needs-area-label
  • Initialize managed and native values in the ICustomMarshaler marshaler to null when the other is null. #109092
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [ilasm] Don't try to overrun the buffer in emitMetaData #109086
    needs-area-label
  • Remove ldsfld quirk #108606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove support for emitting and loading Itanium-64 assemblies #108084
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs and CDacMetadata contracts #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • [draft] [GC] Don't promote gen0 when it is mostly objects moved to the finalization queue #109085
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix GC stress log and analysis #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Switch to Azure Linux VM #108967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Expose GCInfo size and EH clause count as metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Avoid spilling loads of static readonly variables #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT/ARM64] Generate frames compatible with Apple compact unwinding #107766
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Debug info generation does not define types properly #2728

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Add DispatchThunk support, fix issues in functions #2727
  • HikingApp Mac Catalyst sample app #2726
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • Audit all uses of ExecutableWriterHolder and ExecutableWriterHolderNo… #2719
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • Disable PerfTracing #2725
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Oct 24 #2720
  • documented swift closures #2724

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 9.0 .NET SDK shipping binaries from previous servicing bands #44370
  • When i use "dotnet publish" to generate osx-arm64 binary file on my win-x64 pc. I get an incorrect format file. #44359

Closed

  • dotnet command fails after installing .NET SDK 8.0.403 on Mariner 2.0 #44372
  • Create a `solution` alias for the existing `sln` command #40817
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] DiscordChatExporter build with warning：‘ServicePointManager' is obsolete: 'WebRequest, HttpWebRequest, ServicePoint, and WebClient are obsolete. #43621
  • [NETSDKE2E]After installing NET 9 RTM SDK and downloading wasm-tools, uninstalling the SDK does not completely clear the contents under the dotnet directory. #44052

PullRequests

Created

  • Address MD linter issues in VMR README.md #44376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #44375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the shipped RC2 build #44364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #44371
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use non-stable SDK version for SB artifacts #44362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #43626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make the Details command faster to create and drag in fewer DLLs #44366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update net-sdk-supporting-feed #44363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2566554 #44365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore cleanWhileBuilding errors #44361
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Maestro feed automation from NuGet.config in main #44357
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Continue printing out redirected process output after we detect browser launch URL. #44290
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Always print manifest versions in workload list command #44339
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire
  • [Draft] Adding --format support to `dotnet new list` #44140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    DO NOT MERGE, 10.0.1xx
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Dotnet test integration #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Several StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException/System.InvalidCastExceptions when working in a mixed VB/C# solution #75590
  • Balanced Source Generator mode does not work on saving #75586
  • Assert in SyntaxNode.ContainsDirective #75583
    17.13
  • Area: MSBuildWorkspace #75580
  • Nuget redirect to non-existent version 6 of System.Memory: Found conflicts between different versions of "System.Memory" that could not be resolved. #75578
  • .net9 rc1 roslyn crashes on this oneliner: #75577
    17.13
  • What do you mean lack of feedback? I'm here!! :) #75575

Closed

  • Make AbstractCodeActionComputer.GetIndentationAfter async #61998
  • Remove Cannot_navigate_to_the_symbol_under_the_caret from EditorFeaturesResources #59061
    Backlog
  • Invalid Code Generation & Potential Parsing Error #62997
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio is not remembering all options between machines. #62984
    Backlog
  • Consider if "Add Using" quickfix should suggest adding "global" using as well #55895
    Backlog
  • `AccessibilityModifiersRequired` default might not be respected correctly #62908
    Backlog
  • OperatorPlacementWhenWrapping should be moved to formatting options #62936
    Backlog
  • Document Outline show loading bar #62977
    Backlog
  • Document Outline use default search and toolbar #62978
    Backlog
  • Document Outline handle node expand/collapse state across complex edits #62979
    Backlog
  • Remove duplicate code between NavigationBarClient.cs and DocumentOutlineControl.xaml.cs to track text views #62980
    Backlog
  • Visual Basic call hierarchy incorrectly thinks setting function return value is a recursive call #37429
    Backlog
  • Move Static Members refactoring with dialog fails when selecting members from partial class #62846
    Backlog
  • Cleanup fading options #62666
    Backlog
  • Code generator DiagnosticDescriptor Category not shown in Visual Studio Error List #62720
    Backlog
  • `IsKnownIDEDiagnosticId` implementation doesn't look correct #62733
    Backlog
  • Consider separating option definition (name, default value) from its storage #62683
    Backlog
  • Visual Basic Options don't export correctly #62570
    Backlog
  • Revise and combine `GetSymbolModifiers` and `DeclarationModifiers.From` implementation #62416
    Backlog
  • GetAllowedModifiers for record struct should not include 'ref' #62325
    Backlog
  • Generic's closing `>` is missing when there is already an identifier name specified #62356
    Backlog
  • "Generate constructor from members" puts the result above properties #62358
    Backlog
  • There is no way to get "Snippets behavior"/"Enter key behavior" to the default after change #62363
    Backlog
  • Localization misinterpretation #62504
  • DateTime tooltip is US format #62082
    Backlog
  • CodeNamespace.Members does not include records #62523
  • 'Fix paste inside string' happens in cases where it probably shouldn't. #61881
    Backlog
  • Inheriting multiple generic collections, LINQ extensions lose smart hints #61985
    Backlog
  • 'Implement interface' should allow implicit implementation of non-public interface members #62014
    Backlog
  • Lightbulbs to add usings blocked by similar namespaces #61880
    Backlog
  • DiagnosticAnalyzerService.GetDiagnosticsAsync does not return additional file diagnostics #61789
    Backlog
  • Metadata as source is collapsing empty accessors. #61788
    Backlog
  • Introduce parameter for '..' on XML Literal throws Exception. #56337
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices has invalid metadata #53877
    Backlog
  • Computations of top-level semantic versions for a project has multiple issues #49489
    Backlog
  • Using EnvDTE and vsCMAccess to set an access modifier is causing code deletion #58315
    Backlog
  • Extend Quick actions, Replacements and IntelliSense actions scope to "namespace" #54217
    Backlog
  • Diagnostics Inline: Show Hints, Suggestions, Refactorings, Spelling Errors #62105
    Backlog
  • Missing quick action to clean up try/finally or try/catch/finally with an empty finally block #57973
    Backlog
  • Quick Refactoring - Introduce Parameter Object #62106
    Backlog
  • Create Implementation Shortcut in right menu for Interface #62110
    Backlog
  • Quick Actions and Refactorings should allow user to add a new extension method #58688
    Backlog
  • 'Converted to interpolated string' supports InvariantCulture #62111
    Backlog
  • include naming convention fix ups in code clean up #37551
    Backlog
  • Stack Trace Explorer doesn't map async methods in stacks to code #60624
    Backlog
  • Invoking Value Tracking may not open window right away #55986
    Backlog
  • Roslyn VS dialogs should have consistency #55560
    Backlog
  • Inline Diagnostics are being omitted when there's not enough space #61482
    Backlog
  • VS 2019 compiler issue following use of Quick action feature #61544
    Backlog
  • Go To Definition doesn't go to Object Browser. #61411
    Backlog
  • Support pull mode in the DefaultDiagnosticAnalyzerService #61442
    Backlog
  • Option to prefer `new()` over `var` in assignments. #61557
    Backlog
  • Async backfill for completion #61600
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup (C#) with new line preferences doesn't remove all empty lines #61629
    Backlog
  • Add convert unused parameter to discard to code cleanup #61627
    Backlog
  • Show where a thrown error may be caught, akin to find usages. #61628
    Backlog
  • Shift+Alt+F10 for adding missing using directives does not always work inside csharp XML documentation comments #61639
    Backlog
  • ExtractMethodRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #61652
    Backlog
  • IDE Code Fixes available via Error Window. #29268
    Backlog
  • Remove Unused References: Support assembly references #59834
    Backlog
  • We should have a snippet that inserts all required-to-be-initialized fields #61550
  • GetLocation and FindNode are not always reliable #32753
    Backlog
  • "Move to <type>.cs" operation should open the new file in the editor #61340
    Backlog
  • "Generate constructor" doesn't work on records #61338
    Backlog
  • Add more detailed scopes to C# language rules, to allow finer syntax coloring control #61074
    Backlog
  • Two new lowerCamelCase rules for (local variables and parameters) under Tools>Options>Text Editor>C#>Code Style>General #61024
    Backlog
  • Improved suggestions for possible redundant conditional statements #61023
    Backlog
  • ValueTuple reference location does not work for .NET 6.0 completion test #61258
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Use frozen partial semantics for document pull diagnostics #61275
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: No refactoring for standard attribute <NonSerialized> #61277
    Backlog
  • Stack frame parser fails to parse line numbers on .NET #61225
    Backlog
  • Sort order different in .NET 6; impacts tests #61229
    Backlog
  • Add support for splitting & merging "consecutive" conditional expressions #32538
    Backlog
  • Add tests for code action priority #61081
    Backlog
  • Intellisense should not provide completion of class, from which we inherit from #60935
    Backlog
  • Stack Trace Explorer should have middle click to close tab #60848
    Backlog
  • Suggest type parameter constraints, including "generic math" interfaces #60878
    Backlog
  • Stack Trace Explorer Should Open Reference Assemblies #60883
    Backlog
  • Applying IDE0030 on target-typed ternary results in broken code #61016
    Backlog
  • Raw string newline completion should indent when the previous line ends with open brace #60945
    Backlog
  • Attempting bulk suppression using source code attribute in document doesn't suppress anything and silently fails #60983
    Backlog
  • Completion does not update documentation from project references #55418
  • Signature info should use named arguments for selection, but not filtering #22341
    Backlog
  • Suggest lambda when calling method accepting callback #60629
    Backlog
  • Quick Action to add missing fields to intializers #60631
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio help me use Azure App Configuration #60633
    Backlog
  • The type of the group join and join variable after `into` and `join` keywords isn't displayed on tooltip #60680
    Backlog
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60696
    Backlog
  • Inline temporary variable adds extra type conversions in VB #60782
    Backlog
  • Introduce local option is not available in VB when the expression is in an interpolated string #60783
    Backlog
  • Convert to interpolated string refactoring is not available in VB when an implicit conversion is used #60835
    Backlog
  • Better code snippets (capitalize, uncapitalize) #37168
    Backlog
  • Menu that clicks the number of public / private methods not being used anywhere in the system. #39937
    Backlog
  • Add telemetry for EditorConfig rules #60566
    Backlog
  • Add code refactoring to use enum name value instead of integer value #60571
    Backlog
  • Quick Info on built-in operators #59894
    Backlog
  • Do not allow targeted new expression when type is not apparant #60309
    Backlog
  • Highlight capturing lambdas #39850
    Backlog
  • Add integration tests to cover #50974 #51127
    Backlog
  • Source generated file keeps Miscellaneous Files color/message even if features are enabled #58329
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75589
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [LSP] Report unchanged results if diagnostic data is the same as last report #75587
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove "untriaged" label on issue closure or milestone addition #75582
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • IncrementalBinder - properly bind else-if statement #75579
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Update wrapping refactoring provider to be more async #75588
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Upgrade .NET reference and crossgen2 package #75584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused loc string #75585
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Prefer Cancel() rather than Commit() when rename is async. #75562
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • ClrOnly condition is not working on mono #75548
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Field-backed properties: recognize field in interpolated string #75566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference to avoid including msbuild dependencies #75561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure that `GetSymbolInfo` returns only constructor symbols for object creation expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Run binary SDL once on all artifacts #75502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • When replacing CodeStyle analyzers do not provide Features analyzers fallback options #75534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Web app fails to load when waiting asynchronously inside an IHostedService #58578
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58576
  • Set content-type to `application/problem+json` for generic TypedResults with T=ProblemDetails #58574
  • Blazor Templates That Support WebAuthN (Passkeys) #58571
    Backlog
  • Natural culture give wrong ui date format in Windows server 2022/2019 #58564
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext #58563
  • Add support in Kestrel to configure signature algorithms and cipher suites on a per-SNI basis. #58560
  • Expose AspNetCore.Components.Routing.NavLink Active State to ChildContent #58559
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • use nameof for CallerArgumentExpression #58514
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We are hitting some random failures on some of template tests #25458
    Backlog
  • Blazor tests with tricky names failing on GA Release #25457

    .NET 9 Servicing
  • BoxView with no dimension given in a grid is not displayed (unexpected behavior when migrating from Xamarin) #25442
  • Can`t pack maui at local using public resource #25441
  • Referenced assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms does not have a strong name #25439
  • PlatformBehavior is not attached to to the view if the view is in a header or a footer #25438
    Backlog
  • [.NET 9] Shell Flyout menu not rendering after navigating from a MenuItem page #25436
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Shell Flyout header spacing and dynamic height issue on iOS #25435
  • Collection view with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right (end) of collection #25433
    Backlog

Closed

  • CollectionView ItemSizingStrategy:"MeasureFirstItem" renders labels incorrectly (.net8, .net9) #25191
    Backlog
  • Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry #25434
  • [Enhancement] (HybridWebView) - Invoke C# code from JavaScript #6446

  • Codesign fails with replacing existing signature and errSecInternalComponent #25432
  • Blazor Hybrid templates have an empty title bar #25337
  • ScrollView behaviour with Entry and visible Keyboard (iOS) #25455
  • Consider making BlazorWebView Android 'fire and forget' disposal on by default #24250
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • RC2: Triggers and MultiBindings do not inherit their parent datatype #25141
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [net9.0] Blazor MAUI App hangs during back navigation because of disconnect code #24407
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Documentation: macOS install link redirects #25452
  • Assets file ‘C:\*\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net9.0-ios'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net9.0-ios' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #25431
  • Animations are not working in Xiaomi HyperOS (and Oppo ColorOS) #25428

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `DbSet.Count()` in `Select()` lambda not translating to scalar subquery expression #34958
  • SQLServer: ExecuteDelete without Where should translate to TRUNCATE TABLE #34957
  • HasConversion no longer supports captured Object in EF Core 9, when using projection #34956
  • `AlterColumn` not generating SQL for non-nullable constraint #34955
  • Missing `_ord` column when translating an inline collection into a queryable SQL VALUES expression #34954
  • `NonRetryingExecutionStrategy` does not set `ExecutionStrategy.Current` and is ignored. #34953
    Backlog

Closed

  • Abstract base type for IMaterializationInterceptor, possibly other interceptor interfaces #34764
  • Generation of Migrations for new Types / Tables differs in the default value generation from existing types #34619

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.12.1 to 1.13.0 #34948
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.44.0 to 3.44.1 #34947
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
